text: aur jab aap, in mishranavaadiyon ke paas koee nishaanee na laayenge, to kahenge ki kyon (apanee or se) nahin bana lee? aap kah den ki main keval usee ka anusaran karata hoon, jo mere paalanahaar ke paas se meree or vahî€¼yee kee jaatee hai. ye soojh kee baaten hain, tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se (pramaan) hain tatha maargadarshan aur daya hain, un logon ke lie jo eemaan (vishvaas) rakhate hon
